2W0101








[solution]		 _____ 2W0102








[solution]      [Next]
2W0103








[solution]		 _____ 2W0104








[solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0101
    • 1. h3 traps the knight on g4. 2.
    • hxg4

    		_____
  • 2W0102
    • 1. Nxe5+ Qxe5 2. Qxb7+ wins
    • material.

  • 2W0103
    • 1. Qe6+ Kf4 and now 2. Re4 or Qe4
    • mate

    		_____
  • 2W0104
    • 1. Qxf8+ and 2. Bxd8 wins the
    • exchange.

    2W0105








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0106








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0107








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0108








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0105
    • 1. Bf4 wins the bishop on d3 on
    • move 2.

    		_____
  • 2W0106
    • 1. g8=Q+ or (g8=B+) Kxg8 2. Qxg7
    • mate.

  • 2W0107
    • 1. Rxb8+ Rxb8 2. Na6 forks two
    • pieces.

    		_____
  • 2W0108
    • 1. Qb8+ skewers the king. 2. Qxe5
    • wins

    2W0109








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0110








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0111








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0112








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0109
    • 1. Rh5+ Rh7 2. Qxh7 mate or Rxh7
    • mate

    		_____
  • 2W0110
    • The fastest is 1. Rf2 Ke1 2. Qc1
    • mate.

  • 2W0111
    • 1. Rc1 wins the bishop on c8 on
    • move 2.

    		_____
  • 2W0112
    • 1. Qxg6+ Kh8 2. Qg7 mate (or Bg7
    • mate.)

    2W0113








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0114








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0115








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0116








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0113
    • 1. Rxf6!! now if Rxf6 then 2. Qg3
    • mate.

    		_____
  • 2W0114
    • Very simply 1. Qf6 forces mate on
    • move 2.

  • 2W0115
    • 1. Rxa2! if Rxa2 2. Bb3+ wins
    • material.

    		_____
  • 2W0116
    • 1. h6 and there is no stopping 2.
    • Qg7 mate

    2W0117








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0118








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0119








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0120








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0117
    • 1. Re6+ Kd7 2. Rxg6 mate. (or Rf6
    • mate.)

    		_____
  • 2W0118
    • 1. Bxf6 threatens 2. Qxg7 mate and
    • 2. Bxd8.

  • 2W0119
    • 1. Bf6+ Rg7 2. Qf8 mate or 2.
    • Qxg7 mate.

    		_____
  • 2W0120
    • 1. Qh7+ Kf7 2. Nd6+ forks the king
    • and rook
